answers.answer: Hi B, From what do you think is the real problem, try and think what happened when it first come on, things like are you on any meds for stress or depression, these are both sex killers, or diabetes drugs, again sex killer,or just anything else that would help us to help you.

question: I had an excellent relation with my wife and had regular sex life.  But recently, I found that my penis is not being erect and hence could not intercourse.  Kindly advise.  what to do?
title: sexual health
